activity.text:
@sainak 
UserAssingedSerializer is used at 2 places.
1. in FacilityUserViewSet, where I have made the changes to prefetch the skills.
2. in [PatientConsulationSerializer](https://github.com/coronasafe/care/blob/7d14e41251787fe1bbb952ac22278f998b86b24a/care/facility/api/serializers/patient_consultation.py#L68)  here i am not sure how it can be done.
Can u suggest , what can be done here?
